/*
   Author  : Captain C
   Date    : September 2002
   Purpose : CREATE event processing for the EXAMPLES_UPDATES dialog.
   
             This dialog is designed to inform the user of the fact 
             that periodic updates take place and this gives them
             a way to get to the revelation website by demonstrating
             how to simulate a hyperlink.
             
             The functionality for this is contained within the following
             events:
             
                BUTTONUP
                CREATE
                WINMSG
                
   
   Comments
   ========
   
    This CREATE event performs the following functions:
   
      1) Activates the WM_MOUSEMOVE message for the form so that
         we can track mouseovers for the revelation.com site text
         label to make it behave like an hyperlink.
         
         (Of course it would be nice to change the cursor to a hand
         as well but we'll leave that one for another day!)
   
      2) Centers the window and makes it visible
      
      
   Amended   Date       Reason
   =======   ====       ======
   
*/
   declare subroutine send_Message
   $insert logical
   
   equ WM_MOUSEMOVE$ to 0x200
      
   * // Turn on WINMSG tracking for WM_MOUSEMOVE
   call send_Message( @window, "QUALIFY_EVENT", WM_MOUSEMOVE$, TRUE$ )
   
   * // Center the window on the screen ( to center it on the desktop 
   * // involves using the Windows API function SystemParametersInfo
   * // to find out where the explorer taskbar is and using those
   * // coordinates instead ... that's another story :)
   /*
   ctrlArray =        "SYSTEM"
   propArray =        "SIZE"
   
   ctrlArray := @rm : @window
   propArray := @rm : "SIZE"
   
   dataArray =        get_Property( ctrlArray, propArray )
   
   sysSize   =        dataArray[1,@rm]
   winSize   =        dataArray[col2()+1,@rm]
   
   winSize<1> = int( ( sysSize<1> - winSize<3> ) / 2 )
   winSize<2> = int( ( sysSize<2> - winSize<4> ) / 2 )
   
   call set_Property( @window, "SIZE", winSize )
   */
      
	call PlaceDialog(-1,-1)   
RETURN 0


xDialog = xParent + (wParent - wDialog) / 2
    yDialog = yParent + (hParent - hDialog) / 2
